title: Sony Ultra-Portable Bluetooth Speaker SRS-X11- Overview
description:
Sony White Ultra-Portable Bluetooth Speaker - SRS-X11/WHT http://www.abt.com/product/89847/Sony-SRSX11WHT.html

Features
• Size-defying sound with 10 Watts of digital amplification
• Single speaker w/dual passive radiators for big sound
• Speaker Add function (Stereo or Double Modes)
• Bluetooth audio streaming with SBC support
• Convenient One-touch listening technology
• Enjoy up to 12-hours of battery life with a single charge
• Easily take calls using the speakerphone functionality
• Convenient speaker charging via micro-USB input
• Supplied Silicon Accessory Strap
• Available in 5 fun and exciting colors
